FuncDef: The display arp vlan command displays the Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) entries of a VLAN.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VLAN ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Examples: IP ADDRESS      MAC ADDRESS     EXPIRE(M) TYPE        INTERFACE   VPN-INSTANCE
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check ARP entries or locate ARP faults in a specified VLAN, run the display arp vlan command.
